posts.title: Swearing Around The World Book
posts.content: Focus on what really matters when traveling abroad with the “How To Swear Around The World” instructional book. As experienced world travelers can vouch for, it’s not about what or who you know, it’s about how well you can insult someone’s mother in proper dialect.

posts.title: Banned Coffee
posts.content: Start your day off with an extra kick of energy courtesy of the insanely strong Banned Coffee. This potent blend carries a rich aroma in addition to a high caffeine content, and comes packaged in a resealable bag to ensure freshness.

posts.title: Skull Stein Glass
posts.content: Drink your sacred nectar of the gods from a worthy vessel using the skull stein glass. Made in the form of a vicious looking skull with a bone shaped handle, this mug holds up to 16 ounces of frosty goodness while making you look like an utter badass.

posts.title: Virtual Reality Alien Attack Game
posts.content: If you grew up on Space Invaders, you’ll love this virtual reality alien attack game from Sharper Image. It comes with a Bluetooth-enabled blaster that you connect to your smartphone so that you can identify and vaporize the tiny alien invaders right in front of you.

posts.title: Rainbow Color Drip Candles
posts.content: Add a splash of color to your bedroom by lighting up a few rainbow color drip candles. Every time the candle is lit, the brightly colored wax on the inside is released and creates stunning abstract works of art as it drips along the outer edges of the candle.

posts.title: Chalkboard Table Runner
posts.content: Create a fun and engaging environment for guests at your next soirée by serving your delicious eats on the chalkboard table runner. It’s made from extruded food safe plastic and comes with specialized chalk so you can write or draw whatever you wish around your food.

posts.title: Bluetooth Phone Handset Gloves
posts.content: Now you can literally talk to the hand with these Bluetooth phone handset gloves. These gloves feature an earpiece in the thumb and a microphone in the pinky, and are guaranteed to make you look like a crazy person while using it in public.

posts.title: Picnic Backpack
posts.content: Throw out those obsolete bulky baskets and get serious about your outdoor dining with this picnic backpack. It includes everything you need for a superb alfresco dining experience, such as a removable leak resistant liner and a detachable wine holder.

posts.title: Ice Sphere Mold
posts.content: Chill your favorite drink without watering it down with an ice sphere. The ice sphere mold creates perfectly round 2.5″ ice balls that add a touch of elegance to any drink while their slow melting form keeps your drink from becoming too quickly watered down.

posts.title: Colored Skull Candles
posts.content: Place an eerie touch on the room as you provide some great ambient lighting with the colored skull candles. Available in a plethora of lively colors, the vibrant skulls feature a realistic design and create a jaw dropping image as they begin to melt away once they’re lit.

posts.title: Self-Sharpening Knife Block
posts.content: Keep your cutlery as sharp as the day you purchased it by storing it inside this self-sharpening knife block. The wooden block is complemented by a built-in ceramic sharpener that automatically sharpens the knives every time you slide them inside.

posts.title: Electric Ice Cream Maker
posts.content: Enjoy all natural icy treats at a fraction of the cost by cutting out the middleman and making them yourself with the electric ice cream maker.  Using fresh ingredients from your local market you’ll be able to whip up delicious treats that the whole family will love.
